  5. New Major Change Announced By Social Security – It’s Now Official  La Grada EN

item.title: The Hard Truth About Workplace Tragedies: Why Wells Fargo's Loss Doesn't Require a New Policy - Inc.
item.description:
1. The Hard Truth About Workplace Tragedies: Why Wells Fargo's Loss Doesn't Require a New Policy  Inc.
  2. A woman clocked in for work at Wells Fargo on Friday at 7 a.m. 4 days later, she was found dead at her desk.  12news.com KPNX
  3. Why The Death Of The Wells Fargo Employee Found At Work Is So Jarring  Forbes
  4. It took Wells Fargo 4 days to notice that an employee had died in their cubicle  Fortune
  5. Wells Fargo employee found dead at her desk after four days unnoticed  Beaumont Enterprise
